Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Circle
  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
    Version:
    1.0. (15 July 2000)
    Author:
    Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
